DataElement.preferredName: Partial Breast Radiation Therapy Daily Fraction Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Quantity to represent the number of radiation therapy fractions delivered daily during partial breast irradiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Partial Breast Radiation Therapy Daily Fraction
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Partial; being or affecting only a part; not total_One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest._information related to total radiation therapy fractions._Occurring or done each day._Dividing the total dose of radiation therapy into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Partial; being or affecting only a part; not total:One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.:Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Concepts.definition: Being or affecting only a part of something.
One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.

Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring or done each day.:Dividing the total dose of radiation therapy into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.

Concepts.definition: Radiation therapy in which the total dose delivered is divided into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the quantity of radiation therapy fractions.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support v2.0 BOLD CRF based on revisions from reviewers.5.13.2016.dmr
